content.prompt: Based on the chart and your knowledge of world history, which of the following most directly enabled the Dutch to establish and enforce a monopoly on the Southeast Asian clove trade in the seventeenth century?

choices.label: The nutritional benefits of the Columbian Exchange
The development of powerful joint-stock commercial companies
Dutch advances in mapmaking and navigational skills
Advances in medicine that improved Europeansâ€™ ability to survive tropical diseases

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
